name: Seattle, WA: Breakthrough Classroom Management Strategies to Teach and Counsel Troubled Students
content: Learn how to involve troubled and challenged youth in learning. This class explains the challenges that children can face, and how to effectively teach and assist those youngsters. Participants will discover how to best integrate challenged youth and children into programs by successfully managing problems like apathy, bad attitudes, ADHD, withdrawal and more. Call 800-545-5736, email dwells@youthchg.com or visit web site http://www.youthchg.com/
